fields.name: Jordan Retro 4 'Black Cat' 2020
fields.description: After a long fourteen year wait, the legendary Jordan 4 Black Cat is finally making a comeback! Regarded by many sneakerheads as the best AJ4 colourway ever

fields.name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Black Gym Red'
fields.description: Featuring chromed-out leather overlays and hits of Gym Red, the Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Black Gym Red' remakes the shoe that started it all with can't-miss

fields.name: Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN 'Triple Black'
fields.description: Kanye West tapped industry legends Christian Tresser and Steven Smith for the adidas 700 MNVN. The sneaker's usual mixed-material profile is overhauled in favor

fields.name: Nike Air VaporMax Flyknit Black-Anthracite
fields.description: Thirty years of technological innovation culminates on the crowning achievement of Air Max Day 2017: the Nike Air VaporMax Flyknit. Tinker Hatfield introduced

fields.name: Nike Air Max 90 Hyperfuse QS 'Independence Day' Na
fields.description: This incredibly clean new take on the seminal Air Max 90 comes courtesy of Nike's Independence Day celebrations, applying the colours of the Stars and Stripes (price listed is at resale value)

fields.name: NIKE AIR MAX '97 SP 'ITALY'
fields.description: One of the most forward thinking pieces of Nike footwear of all time, the 97 is a silhouette which has always taken to brave design with ease and this new version for

fields.name: Nike Air Max 1 Ultra Moire Trainer
fields.description: Nike Air Max 1 Ultra Moire Trainers in Black and White. Fusion at its finest, the Ultra Moire brings synthetic suede, laser-perforated, one-piece upper inspired by the Nike Air Zoom Moire together with the iconic features of the Air Max 1.

fields.name: Off-White X Converse Chuck 70 Stripe White
fields.description: Fashion forward designer, Virgil Abloh, has linked up with the Swoosh once again for the Off-White x Converse Chuck 70 Stripe White, and it is next level. A rework

fields.name: Adidas Yeezy Boost 700 'Carbon Blue'
fields.description: The adidas Yeezy Boost 700 'Carbon Blue' is a study of tonality inspired by previous 700 models. Debuted in December 2019, the sneaker is presented with a muted

fields.name: Adidas Ultra Boost 3.0 Petrol Night
fields.description: It doesnt get more eye-catching or unique than the adidas Ultra Boost 3.0 Petrol Night. This striking silhouette couldnt arrive at a better time. As we head into the warmer months, sneakerheads are clearly hyped for these more colourful renditions.

fields.name: Adidas Iniki Runner Vista Grey
fields.description: Sporting giants Adidas harness the aesthetic of an archival classic with contemporary technology for their Iniki Runner Boost. Paying homage to the retro runners of the 70s through combination uppers crafted from neoprene and suede.

fields.name: Air Jordan 6 Infrared 23
fields.description: Air Jordan 6 Infrared 23.The sneakers stick with the Toro trend of outfitting classic Air Jordan silhouettes with red based looks.

fields.name: Adidas Originals Stan Smith "Off White"
fields.description: First debuting in 1971 as a tennis all-star sneaker, the adidas Stan Smith has defined itself as todays streetwear legend. For this premium iteration of the silhouette the upper is updated to a textured leather, with the iconic three-stripe branding perforated to the side wall.

fields.name: Air Jordan 1 Mid SE GS 'Rose Patch -D-Yellow
fields.description: dare to be different with this amazing colourway of the low Jordan 1's

fields.name: Air Jordan 11 Retro 'Bred' 2019
fields.description: he Air Jordan 11 Retro 'Bred' 2019 brings back an original colorway initially debuted in 1995. The Tinker Hatfield-designed silhouette features Chicago Bulls colours.

fields.name: Air Jordan 11 Retro GG Heiress Velvet
fields.description: Ready for the holidays Nike's Jordan brand unveils the Heiress Pack, combining a regal touch with the festive edition of maroon velvet.
